A4.text: This is a list of symphonies by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart.

A5.text: Mozart's operas include works such as Don Giovanni, Idomeneo, and others, which are considered classics and remain in the repertory of opera houses.

A6.text: In his maturity, Mozart enhanced traditional forms with the richness of his innovation, as seen in his operas.
